How to Install
===============
1. Pip install AIMinex from PyPI (Not available yet)

2.  
    a. Download AIMinex package
    b. In the terminal, navigate to the AIMinex folder (run "cd AIMinex")
    c. Run "pip install dist/AIMinex-0.0.1-py3-none-any.whl" or "Pip install ."
    d. Type "aiminex" to run
